items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Blog posts / Miscellaneous

*   [Build a Decision Tree in Polars from Scratch](https://towardsdatascience.com/build-a-decision-tree-in-polars-from-scratch/) - A post that explains how to build a decision tree with Polars by [@tocab](https://github.com/tocab). Code used is available on Github [here (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/tocab/efficient-trees).
items.content_html:
Blog posts / Miscellaneous

  • Build a Decision Tree in Polars from Scratch - A post that explains how to build a decision tree with Polars by @tocab. Code used is available on Github here (‚≠ê5).

items.title: Awesome European Tech
items.content_text:
### Index / Crowdfunding Platforms

*   [WhyDonate](https://whydonate.com) üá≥üá± - Raise Money for Charity and Individuals for free.
*   [JustGiving](https://www.justgiving.com) üá¨üáß - The worlds leading online fundraising platform, helping charities to make more with GiftAid.
*   [Goteo](https://www.goteo.org) üá™üá∏ - Open network for crowdfunding, collaborations and training, leader in social innovation.
*   [Boomerang](https://boomerang.dk) üá©üá∞ - Reward, investment and loan-based crowdfunding platform, 100% Danish-owned.
*   [Ulule](https://www.ulule.com) üá´üá∑ - Crowdfunding, certified training courses and a store of sustainable brands, to help develop creative, sustainable projects.
*   [betterplace.org](https://www.betterplace.org) üá©üá™ - Germany's largest donation platform: non-profit and non-profit-oriented.
*   [Give\&Fund](https://www.giveandfund.com) üá¨üá∑ - Easy-to-use and safe crowdfunding platform that offers you a better way to raise money online.
*   [RaiseNow](https://www.raisenow.com) üá®üá≠ - Powerful donation platform for nonprofits of all sizes.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### File Explorer / Diagnostics

*   [Enigama/miss.nvim (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/Enigama/miss.nvim) - Simple popup with changed `unsaved` files, allowing you to save and open them. Helps to avoid forgetting to add something to GitHub or similar.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [neanvo/buben.nvim (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/neanvo/buben.nvim) - Human-readable names to blockchain(eth) addresses.
items.content_html:
File Explorer / Diagnostics

  • Enigama/miss.nvim (‚≠ê10) - Simple popup with changed unsaved files, allowing you to save and open them. Helps to avoid forgetting to add something to GitHub or similar.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • neanvo/buben.nvim (‚≠ê5) - Human-readable names to blockchain(eth) addresses.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### CI and CD

*   [LocalOps](https://localops.co/) - Deploy your app on AWS/GCP/Azure in under 30 minutes. Setup standardised app environments on any cloud, which come with in-built continuous deployment automation and advanced observability. The free plan allows 1 user and 1 app environment.
items.content_html:
CI and CD

  • LocalOps - Deploy your app on AWS/GCP/Azure in under 30 minutes. Setup standardised app environments on any cloud, which come with in-built continuous deployment automation and advanced observability. The free plan allows 1 user and 1 app environment.
